TopicTitle: Add deadly reentry parts to tech tree

Articles.Content: I have just downloaded deadly re entry and have extracted it to my folder but the part are not appearing on my tech tree how do i fix that?

Are you sure the mod has been updated to support tech-tree integration? Some mods haven, some mods haven't. Also, make sure you're running Kerbal Space Program in administrator mode, and check if the parts show up in a sandbox game. Also, make sure you're actually far enough in to the tech tree to have access to the parts.

I think it does ive seen two youtubers using the reentry mod in the tech tree , the parts are there in sand box , im using this one http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/32342-0-20-Deadly-Reentry-2-3-reentry-heat-plus-thermal-and-g-force-damage-to-parts
Check the thread in my signature, it's the continuation of that version. Tech tree support.
